Summary: Over field no sound no movement, blace, finish on object was like smooth black lead, no marks at all. lights on field.
divs: sighting detailsit was a night here in bucks county in january. i was at a meeting 3\4 od a mile up the road from peddlers village. just below new hope pennsylvania.the owners of the property ( large farm)where the meeting was held had a dog that started acting up. the husband kept going out and saying something was out there. he came running in the house and up the stairs followed by 2 other guys all military from willow grove navy base stationed in willow grove. the one guy running past and up the steps said there is something out there and tempest ran off infact ran the electric fence. this went on for a bit and i decided to leave. as i went down the driveway which runs about just less then a 1\4 mile. as i was going down the drivway i relised i did not have my headlights on. for some reason i looked to my right an noticed about 200 feet in the corner of the feild not far fron the farmhouse just below treetop level were lights, bluish and a pinkish while very small lights. i suddenly hit the breaks and turned my lights on and looked back and what ever was there was no longer. as i got to the end of driveway i got the creeps and gunned it out on the road ( 202) and headed south to go home. suddenly for about 3-5 seconds my truck started to vibrate then it was over. i continued south on 202 and comming up to peddlers village i noticed some bright lights over the feild on the left and said to myself when the hell did they put that tower up today. as i got closer i relised there was nothing holding it up. i drove by real slow lookking across the feild and there was what appeared two large black squares with what looked like round windows ( short funnel like) the thing is from an angle you could not see the redish\orange glow from inside unless you looked head on into it. i sat there for what seemed like ever but prolb only 25 mins. looking at the three blueish whits lights comming out from the bottom onto the feild, and in the light where it hit the weeds it looked like daylight.. for some reason beyound me i was going to gwet out of truck and walk over to see it betterbut didnt.i sat at light where 3 other cars were watching at the light. i sat there looking back to see it again as we all were so i thought. even a car that was comming out of one of the restraunts. i must have sat through the light changing 3-4 times and noone moved so i went through the light and called the friends up the road to tell them to go check out what was down the road. they said when they got there nothing was there. the next day though the dog was found dead by driveway and was burried on property.. over the years i noticed where the object was by trees on farm the trees died just about 1\2 way down from the top... i know what i saw and know we dont have something that large as it was the size of two square barns connecter by a huge tube all solid smooth as lead black. im an artist so drawing it for someone who wants to know is no prolbem for me.i dont care what anyone says i know what i saw and it bothers me to this day. oh funny thing , this thing was in the air and did not move or make a sound at all not a peep till 2 other lights came on thats when i saw the tube connected both huge squares and got a real good look at the texture of this objest. smooth as black lead not a dent, rivet at all..here its years later and i still find myself looking at nights hopeing to see it again. you ask what was my feelings, funny i thought im looking at something not from here and i was calm the whole time.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around January 4th 1994
